data.title: Top Songs of 1957
data.meta_description: All US top 40 singles for 1957 including drops, power hits and debuts. Notable artists include Elvis Presley, Pat Boone, Chuck Berry, Ray Charles, ...
data.text:
These are all the Top Songs of 1957.

*Note: Based on the Nolan Method, these are the year-end songs that represented the best songs of 1957. The Nolan Method ranking system was formulated by lead Top40Weekly contributor Jarrett Nolan and is based on a point system for an artist’s chart performance on Billboard charts.
